title: varuvEn enravan
sahitya:
varuvEn enravan kUriyadum kanavO vandiDAdenai vadaippadum muraiyO


anupallavi



caraNam 1    vanak-kuyilE un iniya gAnam avan inkuzhalai ninaivUTTudE tanai ariyAdagam uzhaludE
   caraNam 2    iLam kATrum malar maNamum iniya pozhilum iniyum tAmadam EnO ena vinava
candiranum vandAn kaNNan EnO ennai marandAn idu tagumO
